title: Skillet Tomatoes
introduction: Skillet Tomatoes offer a deliciously simple way to enhance fresh plum tomatoes with the savory flavors of garlic and basil. Perfect as a side dish for grilled or roasted meats, or enjoy it at room temperature smashed onto toasted country bread as an appetizer.
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions.text: Rinse the tomatoes and pat dry. With a small knife, cut around the stem end of each tomato and remove it. Cut the tomatoes in half lengthwise.

In a large skillet, heat the oil with the garlic and basil over medium heat. Add the tomato halves cut-side down. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook until the tomatoes are browned and tender, about 10 minutes. Serve hot or at room temperature.
